description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget 'NoteListItem' representing a note in a list, including UI for displaying note details, a delete action with confirmation, and associated helper classes and methods.

classes.name: NoteListItem
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a note item in a list, with tap and delete functionality.

classes.name: _NoteTexts
classes.description: A private stateless widget to display note title, preview, and timestamp.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Displays a confirmation dialog for deleting a note; if confirmed, deletes the note via provider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI for NoteListItem or _NoteTexts.
